user_query: I'm planning a team building event for my company and I want to include some humor in the activities. Fetch a random joke from Chuck Norris and a manatee joke to share with my colleagues. Additionally, provide me with a praise message to boost team morale.

TaskList.description: Fetch a random Chuck Norris joke to share with the team.
Fetch a random manatee joke to share with the team.
Generate a praise message to boost team morale.
